plot: Willfull 13 year-old Bobby Hackett finds himself home alone for the first time. Clever beyond his years, Bobby sets out to rent an adult film with disastrous results.
title: The Date
plot_es: Willfull 13 year-old Bobby Hackett finds himself home alone for the first time. Clever beyond his years, Bobby sets out to rent an adult film with disastrous results.
plot_en: Willfull 13 year-old Bobby Hackett finds himself home alone for the first time. Clever beyond his years, Bobby sets out to rent an adult film with disastrous results.
